Detailed Description

template<class T>
class SprHelper< T >

Provides quick access to subtrees after a retrifurcation.

Used when enumerating SPR neighbours.

template<class T>
void SprHelper< T >::flagSubtree (  const UPTree< T > &  tree,
int  pos,
const BracketTable< T > &  btable
) 
 

Flag leaf labels of a subtree.

Parameters:
tree Input tree.
pos Start position of the subtree to flag.
btable Bracket Table associated with the tree. Used to identifiy the end of the subtree.

template<class T>
int SprHelper< T >::getFlaggedInverse (  const UPTree< T > &  tree,
const BracketTable< T > &  btable
) 
 

Returns:
The start position of the subtree corresponding to all the un UNflagged leaves.

template<class T>
T SprHelper< T >::nextLeafLabel (  const UPTree< T > &  tree,
int  pos
)  [static]
 

Search for the next leaf in the string starting at pos.

Is potentially O(n) so it may be better to search from both ends or use a bracket table or something.
